
A careless admin signed two messages but accidentally reused the same ECDSA nonce. Recover the private key using the signatures and Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493fbf64ac5ffc82dbdb33470b35704cb283a362bdd5f8ec7d5d9e7773500669748c
